main event: A light purple object larger than a meteorite was observed breaking into 3 pieces while on a southerly heading at an elevation of 15,000-20,000 feet.
interesting points: The object was reported to be moving on a southerly course and broke into three pieces during the observation., The sighting lasted for 1 minute., The object's characteristics did not align with known meteorite decay., The decay was not as rapid as typical meteor reports., The sighting occurred shortly after a reported USA decay incident.
sighted object: light purple object larger than a meteorite
